# UITextField.ViewMode.unlessEditing

**Case**

The overlay view is displayed only when text is not being edited.

## Declaration

```swift
case unlessEditing
```

## Constants

- **UITextField.ViewMode.never**: The overlay view never appears.
- **UITextField.ViewMode.whileEditing**: The overlay view is displayed only while text is being edited in the text field.
- **UITextField.ViewMode.always**: The overlay view is always displayed if the text field contains text.
